data.title: FAQ
data.text:
Although you are purchasing coffee, you are using an ecommerce chanel for that, so your purchase falls under ecommerce category and must be taxed. Our ecommerce platform autocalculates tax payments based on IRS requirements.

We do our best to process and ship all orders as quickly as possible. Processing begins within 30 minutes of order placement so we are unfortunately unable to update shipping addresses after the order is processed.

Please note that all promotional codes are case-senstive and you must be registered and logged in to redeem the promotion on any eligible product. The product must be included in the promotion to be eligible. Promotions cannot be cobmined.

You can track your order by logging in to your account, select section orders and view your shipping status. If this function is not possible, please contact us through our contact form.

In most cases, packages prematurely marked delivered by the carrier will be delivered within the next couple of days. We kindly request you to check your mailbox, any locker or mailroom and confirm if no other household members or neighbors retrieved the package.

Cancellation will be possible only if order has not been processed. You may email us.customerservice@lavazza.com for cancellation requests. Please advise cancellation reason.

Unfortunatley we are not able to modify orders. We can cancel your order if it has not been already processed.

We ask our suppliers to accept the Code of Ethics as an integral part of our contractual relationship, undertaking to comply with the rules contained therein. www.lavazza.com/en/about-us/company/work-with-us You are welcome to access our contact us page if you have any questions.

In the years since its establishment in 2004, the non-profit Giuseppe e Pericle Lavazza Foundation has organised 31 projects in 19 countries and 3 continents, the benefits of which are felt by over 130.000 coffee-growers. One aim shared by all of the programmes is the development of sustainable entrepreneurship, to bring about an improvement in the living conditions of the entire community. The Foundation supports the autonomy of local communities by emphasising the value of female workers involving the younger generations. It encourages good agricultural practices in order to improve crop yields and coffee quality, and promotes the introduction of technological tools as a means to counter the effects of climate change.

The Lavazza Training Center is an authentic coffee university: we organize training courses for baristas, restaurant staff, sales reps, our distributors, newly-hired staff, journalists and opinion leaders. Sharing our expertise is the mission of the Lavazza Training Center. It has the largest coffee training network, with 8 offices in Italy and 42 around the world, dedicated to professionals, business clients and coffee lovers.

We have a strong presence, offering the most suitable solutions to all consumers and clients, whatever the occasion and whatever the time of day. We appreciate your interest and we are eager to become your business partners. Please contact us via contact form

You may update your address accessing Personal Area. In case you have a subscription, you may need to update the subscription delivery address as well.

By accessing Personal Area and updating the new credit card or paypal information. You also have the option to delete the old form of payment.

In line with our commitment to sustainability and to help get the Lavazza offerings coffee drinkers love on shelves more quickly, we have moved production of some of our top items for North America from Italy to West Chester, PA. The coffee is still sourced by the same buying team in Italy to ensure the same coffee ends up in your bag at home. Our quality controls remain identical to those in Italy, with product testingevery hour by expert tasters.

The coffee is sourced, roasted, ground and packed just as it is in Italy; it’s even made on the same packaging line that was used in Italy! Expert blenders and quality control technicians are now based out of West Chester, PA, to ensure the same quality coffee you’ve come to know and love from Lavazza.

Lavazza sources its coffee on a global scale from coffee-growing countries, utilizing local teams to ensure the highest quality product is selected. The same buying team in Italy continues to source our coffee, and our West Chester facility has expert blenders and quality control technicians on site to guarantee the same quality and taste as the coffee we produce in Italy. Whether the coffee is roasted and packaged in Italy or the United States, the same coffee and sourcing methods are utilized to ensure a consistent taste profile year over year.

The only difference in the packaging will be a designation that the product is manufactured in the United States according to the US regulatory Framework.

Some products will be produced in the US and others will continue to be manufactured in Europe. You are guaranteed the same in-cup result regardless of production location. You can find more product information at www.LavazzaUSA.com.

No changes or updates were made to any of the products aside from being manufactured in the United States.

No, our team worked closely with the team in Italy to keep the processes as close as possible in order to deliver the same great product. Machines that were in our Italian manufacturing facility were shipped to the new U.S. manufacturing site. The U.S. and Italian R&D teams worked together to ensure the coffee tastes just as it does when manufactured in Italy.
